prompts: Create a powerful steel-type Pokemon with a sleek, mechanical design and bright blue colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines metallic features with a robust, multi-limbed body, perfect for battles.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a high-tech robot, complete with shiny surfaces and intricate details.
Show me a futuristic Pokemon that embodies strength and intelligence, with a unique color palette.
Design a formidable Pokemon that has a combination of blue and gray tones, ideal for a competitive landscape.
Give me a Pokemon with a distinct shape and color that stands out in any battle scenario.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a fusion of a robot and a creature, with vibrant colors.
